p.i: Write a Python function that meets the following specification:

text.pre: def apply_func_to_list(func, L): """ func, function that takes in an integer and returns another integer L, list of integers Returns a tuple with two elements. The first element is a new list, L_new. L_new is the same length as L, and its element at index i is the function func applied to L[i]. The second element is the maximum element in L_new. """
text.p: Enter your definition for the function. Click the blue Submit button to make sure that you copied your code correctly and that it passes our basic tests.
